metadata.title: CVE-2018-4267 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 11.4.1, tvOS 11.4.1,Safari 11.1.2, iTunes 12.8 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4267` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.5-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.20.5-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.5-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
